content: lion brand pattern # 561 skill level beginner level 1 lion® chenille article #530 *discontinued* 348 yards crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm crown is worked from the bottom up work brim and add daisy to finish see also floppy brim hat child 1 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/floppy-brim-hat-child
